atDirectives.name: @import
atDirectives.description: Import external stylesheets or Tailwind CSS modules.

atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the @tailwind directive to insert Tailwind's base, components, utilities and variants styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use @apply to inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Use the @layer directive to tell Tailwind which 'bucket' a set of custom styles belong to. Valid layers: base, components, utilities.

atDirectives.name: @variants
atDirectives.description: You can generate variants of your own utilities by wrapping their definitions in the @variants directive.

atDirectives.name: @responsive
atDirectives.description: You can generate responsive variants of your own classes by wrapping their definitions in the @responsive directive.

atDirectives.name: @screen
atDirectives.description: The @screen directive allows you to create media queries that reference your breakpoints by name.

atDirectives.name: @custom-variant
atDirectives.description: Define custom variants for Tailwind CSS v4. Used to create custom pseudo-class variants.

atDirectives.name: @theme
atDirectives.description: Use the @theme directive in Tailwind CSS v4 to define theme values inline. Supports 'inline' parameter for CSS custom properties.

atDirectives.name: @config
atDirectives.description: Configure Tailwind CSS settings directly in CSS files (Tailwind v4 feature).

atDirectives.name: @plugin
atDirectives.description: Load Tailwind CSS plugins directly in CSS files (Tailwind v4 feature).
